structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 2, effective January 1, 1981.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: County clerk to collect ad valorem taxes on motor vehicles and trailers -- Due date -- Evidence of payment -- Liability for taxes -- Tax lien -- Appeal of assessment -- Fee for collection.
